battleship.domain

Class Logic

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship.domain.Logic

  • public class Logic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class groups together the essential classes for game functionality and handles their initialization and game end status

    • Method Detail

      • gameEnded

        public boolean gameEnded()
        Checks the both boards' cells for any remaining ships and sets gameWon to true if the player has won.
        Returns:
        true if game has ended, otherwise false
